name: Arrow Time U
description: Arrow Time U has you take control of none other than a neon blue arrow. With limited time, health, and special powers, it's your job to point your arrow in the right direction… and take it there as well! Your unique movement mechanisms and abilities to slow down time and move through any object will certainly help, but you'll need both quick thinking and quick reactions to overcome all the obstacles and foes in your way in this top-down 2D game.
